title: SCRIPTERS ARE RUINING EVERYTHING
body:
Riot, when are you going to actually install harsh penalties for those who script? it is LITERALLY leeching the fun out of the game. 
i am at the point where i am considering DOTA 2 or Smite, i love MOBA games and this is sade that you've neglected duties to the point the game is 
breaking, i thought you guys had something great going but it will just end up on the "has been" list. i am not the only one effected by this as several people are growing tired of it, as i'm typing this i am loading into an ARAM (my favourite mode) and 7/10 players are scripters.. do you not have an ACS? do you not care? i report them and see them consecutively for 3 days... still scripting.. feels bad man.

replies.body:
DotA2 has cheaters, as does SMITE.

Cheaters cannot be banned instantly else it will give away their system to detect cheating software. Also, three days? It has been years and Riot still hasn't changed that guys name that contained a homophobic slur. However, they are decent with scripters. I would know. It's a dying market... perhaps because League is also dying.

dota (bored aussie) had a block list

JUST ADD A BLOCK LIST JESUS CHRIST or make ignore do it so it would actually be useful, person on ur ignore list, cant join ur game, simple
Ikr. Met scripter dude playing lucian only and have 95 percent wr. I reported him twice after game but riot did not take any actiom yet. It is dumb and his account has to be deactivated asap.
